title: Nordic Smart Government & Business Lookup
subtitle: data.altinn.no
introText:
This is a proof-of-concept using data.altinn.no to acquire information about businesses from national registries, mapping them to the Agent-based Nordic Business Data Model.

Input is a country code and the business identifier, separated by a colon, i.e. NO:991825827. There are ready-made examples below.



In order to obtain your own apikey, just register at data.altinn.no and make a subscription to the NSG product - the process is described here
text1: Data on organisations from Sweden, Finland, Iceland, and Norway.
text2:
You can search for organisations registered in
  • the Swedish Companies Registration Office, country code SE
  • the Finnish Trade Register – PRH, country code FI
  • Iceland Revenue and Customs, country code IS
  • the Norwegian Brønnøysund Registry Centre, country code NO
text3: To use the search service, you must obtain an API key from data.altinn.no.
text4:
There are two status codes for Sweden, Finland, and Norway:
  • None
    No need to check further status
  • Some
    Please contact the registry in the country where the organisation is registered for more information about the status.
text5: Icelandic organisations have two statuses: 1 – active  and  2 – inactive.</br>
